thread.title: Brian Lennox
thread.title_full: Mikes Dive Store reviewed by Brian Lennox

author: Brian Lennox
title: Brian Lennox
text: I recently used Mikes Dive Store for the first time and have been thoroughly impressed by the level of service provided. The site is easy to navigate through so finding what I needed and ordering was painless. After which this was followed up by great communication and superb customer service. Items arrived promptly and were great value for money. I will definitely be putting this company to the top of my suppliers list and would happily recommend them to anyone else considering using this company. Great work guys.
